ygData.msgSnippet: ... First of all see a guild master and train your only trainable point in research save some coin and buy a lexicon bout 11 plat and change research your
ygData.messageBody:
Tonster wrote:

> From: "Tonster" <tonster123@...>
>
> I just have
> a lot of questions and ANY help from my brothers here would be great!
> Thanks in advance for the help!
>

First of all see a guild master and train your only trainable point in research save some coin and buy a lexicon bout 11 plat and change research your language skills in old erudian till you can read the wizards canon or find a cheat list of spells
components
pop your runes into the lexicon to make the appropriate spells and hit combine.

If successfull ye will end up with a spell.

Xzar
